name: react-amphi (Node + pnpm)
postCreateCommand: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@$(node -p "((require('./package.json').packageManager||'').split('@')[1]||'latest')") --activate && PLAYWRIGHT_SKIP_BROWSER_DOWNLOAD=1 pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm --filter @amphi/web exec playwright install chromium
